General.Name: Integrated Wind Solutions AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Integrated Wind Solutions ASA, through its subsidiaries, provides offshore wind services in Norway, Denmark, Taiwan, Belgium, France, Finland, and internationally. It operates in two segments, IWS Fleet and IWS Services. The company offers a fleet of walk-to-work vessels, which provide services to the offshore wind industry that include installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance; and designs, engineers, constructs, operates, and manages services to onshore and offshore wind industry. It also provides asset management consulting and advisory; and commercial and technical management services. Integrated Wind Solutions ASA was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Oslo, Norway.
